name: LimRic Plumbing, Electrical, Heating & Air
address: 4546 Dorchester Rd, North Charleston, SC 29405, USA

reviews.author: Vonie Gilreath
reviews.text:
Project 1- Gas line to heater replaced. Work done quickly at a good price with excellent coordination with city and Dominion Energy. Tommy replaced the gas line and did a great job.
Project 2- Shower/ bath replaced in 1945 house.  Project was complicated by extensive water damage but LimRic did a phenomenal job.  Kenny provided reasonable estimates while technician Trevon and apprentice Kevin completed the job on time and on budget.

reviews.author: Ward Patrick
reviews.text: From the initial call to installation everything was seamless. They took all my information down and a short time later I was contacted via text with the technician's information, a short bio, and a photo so I knew who to look out for. Hagan showed up and immediately recognized that I would need a new tank due to the type of leak I had. He explained the process and what I could expect and left to go get a new tank. He returned a short time later and installed the tank with zero complications providing A+ quality work. I would 100 percent use Lim-Ric again and without a doubt recommend them and their technicians to everyone. Great job Hagan and Lim-ric!

reviews.author: L Nix
reviews.text:
Andrew was amazing and professional
Customer service and time frame was unheard of these days. But‚Ä¶.
I am left with a hole in my ceiling and lots of bathroom modifications. Andrew let me know ahead of time,  thankfully. But as a single mom, I now have to find a handyman to fix all this.

reviews.author: Brad Irvin
reviews.text: Lamont was very nice and helpful . This is the second time that I have used them. I feel like their parts could be a lot cheaper and or above average price. Last time I used them, they had to replace a sensor that cost me about $700. This time they are having to replace another sensor and a motherboard, and it‚Äôs gonna cost almost $2000. Unfortunately, I‚Äôm going out of town and don‚Äôt have time to shop around. Great service and timely but I‚Äôm sure there are more frugal options

reviews.author: Shane Waters
reviews.text: 5 stars! On Christmas Day my disposal went out, we had family staying with us so it was a bit of an emergency. The next day I called a LimRic competitor who I held a membership with to see if they could come out ASAP - they told me they could get to me 5 days from then which was not going to work, despite paying for a monthly membership. I called LimRic and they sent Mike out hours later who walked me through the situation and gave me an honest opinion on what to do. I bought a new disposal and since I already had the appt with the other company I planned to have them install it. That day came and they did not show up when they said they would. I called and they told me they would get to me when they got to me, that was not an option for me. I called LimRic again and let them know that if they could somehow make it work to send someone out to install the new disposal, I would cancel my current membership and move to LimRic. They were able to send Mike out again, on the same day just hours after I spoke to them and I switched my membership right then. I was asking a lot of them but they accommodated my requests and were honest the entire time. Mike was fantastic and I really appreciate what he and LimRic did for me. Could not recommend this company enough!

name: J Stephens Plumbing LLC
address: 1985 Riviera Dr 16 Ste 103, Mt Pleasant, SC 29464, USA

reviews.author: Tina Frazier
reviews.text: Indoor shower head broke immediately after installation, owner replaced and said it was likely over tightened. It failed again and was leaking a couple of months later and would not guarantee work. Spent $285 to install an outdoor shower head supplied by them in October, couple of months later it fell off and would not guarantee work again. Very disappointing, I have been a customer for years and will be looking for a new plumber unfortunately.

reviews.author: Decanus Londinium
reviews.text: Remodeling my bathroom and J Stephens did all the plumbing. Removed old water lines. Added new lines in different locations. Installed in wall toilet system. Updated copper with PEX. Very good work at a good price.

reviews.author: Mary M
reviews.text:
Kyle did a great job changing the cartridge in the shower handle valve, as we could suddenly not turn it on. He is very knowledgeable, efficient, professional and competent. He changed the part in less than half hour with no mess left behind. Gave us one year warranty.
Appointment was timely. Called Monday and service was scheduled for Tuesday.
Would request Kyle again for future plumbing needs..
Cost was $338.00.

reviews.author: Christina
reviews.text: J Stephens has been the go-to for my rental properties for three years. Their techs are professional, courteous, competent, and efficient. Randall and Lee did a fantastic job on the two service calls over the last two days. They responded quickly, resolved the issues quickly, and communicated excellently throughout. They are great partners to my STR business as their quick response and resolutions help ensure guest satisfaction. Plus, J Stephens honored the warranty. I'm a pleased and loyal customer!

reviews.author: Myron Tucker
reviews.text:
I wrote the review below several months ago.   Since that time the company has been completely unresponsive.  Myself and my neighbor have called them nearly twenty times to come replace a recirculating pump that they ordered and told us was now in stock.   We have left MULTIPLE voicemails and I have talked to three different people who say the service department would contact us.  NOTHING HAS HAPPENED.   So, at this point I am no longer recommending J Stephens as their service response has been HORRIBLE.  If you are thinking about plumbing, get another company.
Previous review below, now completely wrong.
I have had several things done by J Stephens.  Always great service.  Axel is a great technician, knowledgeable, courteous and efficient.  Best plumbing service I have ever had.

name: Palmetto Plumbing, Drain Cleaning & Water Heater Repair
address: 835 Savannah Hwy Suite 209, Charleston, SC 29407, USA

reviews.author: Jo Kokri-Bhatt
reviews.text: I just had Palmetto Plumbing put in a new toilet for me, after a couple other unreliable plumbers failed to. As I run a business too, I know how difficult it is. So I appreciate their stellar service that much more. They were as punctual as possible, knowledgeable, tidy, efficient and courteous! I am glad I happened to find and follow up with them on this matter :)

reviews.author: Brandon Lilly
reviews.text: I called Palmetto Plumbing on a holiday weekend Saturday night around 11PM with a plumbing emergency. Stephen arrived at my home quickly after the call was placed. He was very kind, professional and thorough. Prior to calling Palmetto Plumbing, I had tried all the big name companies in the area (Limric, Blitch, Fix-It 24/7, C&C Myers) who claim to offer ‚Äúemergency after hours and 24/7 emergency calls‚Äù but was told either they did not have anyone available and could not come until Monday. I would highly recommend them as a fair and reliable local family owned business who actually did provide emergency call service.

reviews.author: Davies Merry
reviews.text: Steve was amazing and VERY affordable for the work he had to do!! His knowledge is unmatched, every issue whether it was bolts rusted together he had to cut through, to fittings being different sizes, he had the right tools and a solution for everything.  He rebuilt all the parts and pieces inside of one of our toilets, replaced another toilet, and re-ran all of the plumbing and fixtures for our vanity. A true expert plumber, which is very hard to find these days, especially at a reasonable price! Thank you Steve!!

reviews.author: Igor Lavrinovich
reviews.text:
Exceptional Service & Professionalism

Palmetto Plumbing came to my home yesterday, and I couldn‚Äôt be more impressed with the experience. From start to finish, their team was punctual, professional, and incredibly friendly.

Not only did they complete the job efficiently, but they also took the time to explain what they were doing and made sure I understood the entire process. They even offered helpful advice on future improvements I might consider for my home‚Äôs plumbing system - without any pressure.

It‚Äôs rare these days to find a company that combines great technical work with such personable customer service. I‚Äôm very glad to have found them and will absolutely be using them for all my plumbing needs moving forward.

Highly recommend!

reviews.author: Andrew Shedlock
reviews.text: Stephen was excellent, super experienced knowledgable and *honest* at time when we really needed a reliable professional plumber to step up and close the deal on a kitchen renovation contract with a major home improvement company that was making a mess.  Stephen saved us and delivered great results at a fair price in the clutch that saved the entire project from going off the rails.

photos.attribution: Palmetto Plumbing, Drain Cleaning & Water Heater Repair

name: Purpose Plumbing
address: 1068 Clements Ferry Rd, Charleston, SC 29492, USA

reviews.author: Debbie Molnar
reviews.text: I had made an appointment to have my tankless water heater descaled. It's a yearly maintenance. Boy am I glad I called back to find out how much it was going to cost! Last year it was $250 which is a little high but I could swing it. This year it's $400!! I cancelled the appointment. I can get the same service for $150. The chemicals cost $30 on Amazon & takes an hour to do. Certainly not worth $400! Eventhough they do good work, they're outpricing themselves in the plumbing field.

reviews.author: Eric Meckley
reviews.text: Had them come to take a look at our shower. The plumber never listened to us describe the problem or bother attempting any troubleshooting. They charged us around $400 for a part we didn‚Äôt need, installed it improperly, and left without fixing the issue. I had to get involved and fix the issues that they caused on my own and still don‚Äôt have a functioning shower.

reviews.author: Paula Strong
reviews.text: Took only an hour to put the tank in. Took over three weeks to attempt to put the enclosure on the outdoor tank. They did not take the time to measure what they would need to put on the enclosure so it did not happen. I sent them away ..technician Scotty had a very bad attitude. He was passive aggressive. Wanted to blame me for his bad judgment. The job was not completed. They sure $2000 to install the heater and the expansion tank. $1000 labor for one hour. Very greedy.

reviews.author: Valerie de Ropp
reviews.text: They gave me a quote that was way above what it took to actually fix my shower.  I only needed a washer replaced and they told me they needed to make two holes in my wall and replace everything for $1,600!  I got Simply Plumbing to fix the washer for about $400.  Call Simply Plumbing.

reviews.author: Felicia Lenarczyk
reviews.text: This may be a good plumbing company but their social etiquette could use some work. Parked blocking all traffic in a busy plaza because they may have had to walk a little further. They are casually sitting eating with zero regard for others. Just rude.

reviews.author: Jeanniepotter Potter
reviews.text:
Fix-It Plumbing and HVAC in Charleston, SC is simply outstanding‚Äînot just for their technical expertise, but for the genuine care, professionalism, and humanity they bring to their work. They installed my furnace and completed a number of a  jobs. I have never been disappointed with their exceptional service..

From the very first interaction, Tony, Paul, and Joel provided truly personal, attentive, white-glove service. They took the time to explain everything clearly, treated my home (and me) with respect, and followed through exactly as promised. Their workmanship is top-notch, meticulous, and dependable‚Äîthis is a company that takes real pride in doing things the right way. Again, they do it right the fIRST time..

What sets Fix-It apart, however, goes far beyond plumbing and HVAC. When I lost my beloved husband, the entire office sent me a handwritten condolence card signed by everyone. That level of kindness and thoughtfulness is rare these days‚Äîand deeply meaningful. It spoke volumes about the character of this company and the people who work there. Thank you to all and especially Madison.

I am incredibly grateful for Tony, Paul, Joel, and the entire Fix-It team. They are compassionate, professional, responsive, and simply amazing. If you want a company you can trust completely‚Äîone that treats you like a person, not a number‚ÄîFix-It Plumbing and HVAC is the gold standard. I only wish all companies had this professionalism. Again, they are the GOLD STANDARD.

reviews.author: Shakara Mitchell
reviews.text: I had an excellent experience with my technician Michael O. from 24/7. He was extremely thorough and took the time to explain everything that was going on with my AC system. He provided clear photos, walked me through the issues step by step, and made sure to consult with his supervisor and the finance department to give me accurate information. I really appreciated how transparent and patient he was. It made a stressful situation much easier to understand. Highly recommend their services.

reviews.author: marcus morton
reviews.text: Christian did an outstanding job. I had a very good experience when they sent a crew to replsce my AC unit in July and this was the first service of the unit. Christian is a clean cut and well mannered young man. He was very thorough and explained what he was doing along the way and made recommendations as he serviced the furnace and air conditioning. Christian took pictures of the components and those were attached to the invoice that was promptly emailed to me. There were no surprises and I wasn't pressured into buying anything else. It is a wonderful to have a company that has only sent polite and knowledgeable technicians to take care of my heating and cooling needs. Thank you Christian for taking the time to make sure everything is working as it should be.

reviews.author: Laurie Miller
reviews.text: This company treats veterans with the respect they deserve. They offer free tune up/checks on your heating/air conditioning unit. Joshua Brown was my technician and he did an amazing job. He took his time to explain everything and even took pictures so I could see the unit in the attic. I had concerns about my unit being ‚Äúat the end of its usefulness‚Äù and he helped me get a great deal on a new one installed today. Dylan and Andrew got the new unit installed quickly and extremely knowledgeable in what they do. I would 100% recommend this company to anyone especially veterans!

reviews.author: Asher Blue (SandPit)
reviews.text:
My Mr. Fix-it is Mexican with a wife and two kids.  I said we will probably meet at Publix Cane Bay !!  He's a good tech. He had to run to get a part for the A/C and when I returned he was just pulling off everything is fixed.  He talked me into duct cleaning !  WOW!! you must be joking about the price BUT the vents haven't been cleaned for at least 17 years.  I bought the home Jan 2014. I'm going to go with the duct cleaning but I hope the firm takes into consideration  my 27 year veteran status so I don't suffer night mares about the money.  I am a good loyal customer and wish to continue with the Fix-It techs.  They know what they are doing !!!!!
The other two guys were excellent with the duct cleaning.  We can breathe clean air again.  It also seems more warm air comes through the fresh duct-work!  thanks again.  Lee Wachter

name: Blue Collars | Charleston Plumbing and HVAC

reviews.author: Kailan Cruz
reviews.text: Today I was blessed by the presence of Felix and Allen when my apartment complex had an issue with my water heater. I was worried I would have to wait forever long for it to be replaced but they handled it with efficiency!! They were great conversationalists! Not only in explaining what they were doing, but overall just talking w us while they were working. When i am one-day (hopefully) a future homeowner, I will be reaching out to this company and hopefully Allen and Felix for all my plumbing needs ü•∞

reviews.author: Kalleigh Norval
reviews.text: We had a bit of an emergency plumbing situation and a neighbor recommended Blue Collars. From the start, Clayton and the team were friendly, punctual, and clearly had great expertise. They explained everything they were doing at each step and made sure to stick around until the issue was properly resolved (which included some work from the city!). Can‚Äôt thank them enough, will definitely recommend and call again if needed!

reviews.author: Luminita Management
reviews.text: We‚Äôve had a great experience working with Blue Collar, especially during the transition of newly acquired properties. The service team (Jordan, Marc, PK, Andrew, and Wes) have been incredibly responsive, professional, and helpful every step of the way. They‚Äôve been quick to respond to service calls, taken the time to clearly explain issues and solutions, and consistently completed work in a timely manner. Having a reliable team like this during a transition makes a huge difference, and we truly appreciate their support and attention to detail. Highly recommend Blue Collar for their service and professionalism.

reviews.author: Michael Kovaleski
reviews.text:
This review is specifically for the HVAC department at Blue Collars.

I manage almost 400 apartments with hvac units that are going on 11 years old.  These are my go to people for major repairs and system replacements.

The HVAC team is extremely reliable, always on time, very professional, and excellent at communicating throughout the entire process. Their work is top-notch and done right the first time.

Shout out to Andrew, Marc, Jordan, Wess, and PK ‚Äî great people who represent Blue Collar‚Äôs HVAC department well.

I highly recommend Blue Collar‚Äôs HVAC services.

reviews.author: Bora Yatagan
reviews.text:
I‚Äôve had a great experience working with the Blue Color HVAC department. The team is knowledgeable, responsive, and always willing to help when it matters most. Big shoutout to Andrew, Jordan, Wess, Marc, and PK these guys have come through for me multiple times and truly know their stuff.
It‚Äôs good to know you‚Äôre working with people you can rely on when you need support. I really enjoy working with this team and appreciate everything they do.

name: Avery's Plumbing, Tankless, & Water Filtration
address: 1501 Belle Isle Ave ste 112, Mt Pleasant, SC 29464, USA

reviews.author: Noelle Itharat
reviews.text: Chris Devlin is an expert in his field and also one of the nicest people you'll ever meet. He's provided countless plumbing repairs for us at our home and medical practice for many years. He's done tankless heater service, water heater repair and replacement, replaced water lines, installed new plumbing lines, replaced sinks and hardware, cleared clogged toilets and drains, fixed and replaced toilets, repaired and installed new showers, just about anything plumbing you can think of - he's done for us. He's also come to our rescue for many minor plumbing repairs and also some very serious/larger emergency plumbing repairs. He is the most honest and hardworking person you will find in this industry. He is exceptionally skilled and treats all customers promptly and with consideration for their home/business. We are grateful for his service. As a result, Avery & Sons is the one company I recommend with confidence frequently as the service is truly always the best.

reviews.author: Sean McColl
reviews.text:
Chris came out and quickly diagnosed and then repaired a problem that two other companies had not been able to adequately address. While he was on site, he also completed two other small projects I needed done.
Chris explained everything to me ahead of time, was professional throughout, and a was pleasure to deal with.
I highly recommend Avery & Sons Plumbing.

reviews.author: Jason Potter
reviews.text:
Chris Devlin is hands down the best plumber in Horry County. I‚Äôve worked with him for many years in real estate development, and he continues to impress every single time. As a broker, I refer Chris to all of my clients and the feedback is always the same: he‚Äôs punctual, professional, and gets the job done right the first time.

His pricing is fair, his work ethic is exceptional, and he treats every homeowner with genuine respect. Chris is not only a true expert in his craft, but also a wonderful person who cares about the quality of his work and the people he serves.

I highly recommend Chris Devlin for any plumbing needs. You won‚Äôt find better.

reviews.author: Kenara Hill
reviews.text: 100% would recommend! They were truly a God-send to our family when we needed our water turned back on after hours. Their kindness, patience, and willingness to serve reflected Christ‚Äôs love so clearly. Our kids absolutely loved them and learned so much. We are beyond grateful and would wholeheartedly recommend them to others.

reviews.author: Mark L.
reviews.text: John was a pleasure to work with‚Äîcourteous, knowledgeable, and very professional. He took the time to explain how the smart-water shutoff works. I would not hesitate to use him again or recommend him to others.

name: Charles Towne Plumbing
address: 4952 Rivers Ave, North Charleston, SC 29406, USA

reviews.author: Caleb Hund
reviews.text: The Charles Towne Plumbing crew is great! Very knowledgeable and professional. They get straight to the point and don‚Äôt mess around. I highly recommend them for all your plumbing needs.

reviews.author: Kristin Milam
reviews.text: They were able to come out same day to one of our rental properties. Our tech Chris was personable and professional. He diagnosed the problem and made repairs quickly. Would recommend and use again.

reviews.author: Katie Hogan
reviews.text: We‚Äôve used this plumbing company before and they‚Äôre always great, but Will was awesome. I called the day before and he showed up the next day - right on time at 8am. Will was super communicative and went above and beyond to fix our issue. He took the time to explain the problem and did everything he could to get us back up and running. Will definitely be our go-to moving forward ‚Äî highly highly recommend!

reviews.author: Kevin Alford
reviews.text: Sean did an amazing job to get us up and running again. A blocked drain line had everything shutdown, including toilets, showers and sinks. He stayed late into the night to ensure we had our necessary services returned. I was pleased to get same day service in addition to a professional and courteous staff. I wouldn‚Äôt hesitate to call Charles Towne Plumbing in the future.

reviews.author: Wes Denney
reviews.text:
Brown Dog Deli experienced an emergency situation, and Charles Towne Plumbing responded quickly and professionally. They were fast, efficient, affordable, and handled the issue with complete resolve.

Chris was an amazing and knowledgeable technician who was even willing to show up at five in the morning so we could get everything taken care of without missing a beat in our business operations.

I would certainly highly recommend Charles Towne Plumbing, and we will absolutely be using them for our future needs. You should do the same.

name: Atta-Boy Plumbing LLC
address: 2178 B Savannah Hwy STE 10, Charleston, SC 29414, USA

reviews.author: Alex J
reviews.text: Great experience and highly recommended. They replaced the entire plumbing system for the whole house (changed old brittle CPVC to new PEX, new valves, everything). All work was done neatly and professionally with high quality materials, the team was careful to lay down floor protection anywhere they worked, and followed up after work was complete to make sure all was as it should be. Very easy to work with, communicated well, and attentive to their work. Would gladly recommend to friends and family.

reviews.author: Don Francis
reviews.text: Quality of the work was good but pricing was very high. Had 2 items to be completed, replace a toilet flange and cut and shorten the water supply line. They were onsite for 45 minutes to replace the toilet flange only as I decided to do the water line myself. The quote for the water line was $250.00 and it took me 5 minutes to complete after a quick visit to the plumbing supply store. Parts for the water line was $11.23. This is obviously where we are headed with the shortage of tradesmen.

reviews.author: Clayton Patton
reviews.text: We have used Atta-Boy Plumbing many times over the last few years for various plumbing jobs and they have always done a nice job, listened to our problems, and treated our home with care. Most recently we had a leak from one of our bathrooms into our garage and they were here promtply at 8 AM the next morning to assess and help us fix the problem. Would recommend Atta-Boy to anyone looking for a reliable and professional solution to your plumbing needs.

reviews.author: Don Stilwell
reviews.text: Jody (I believe that's how you spell his name) was out at our house in Oak Terrace Preserve in North Charleston last week.  He was scheduled to be there somewhere between 8 and 10 am, and he was at the door promptly at 8.  Bonus points for that!  All of our bathroom faucets were running very slow and light flows, and Jody worked on each one, telling me exactly what he was doing and why, not only fixing my problems, but educating me along the way.  He was pleasant, personable and professional.  This is exactly what I want when someone comes to my house to do work.  I will absolutely be calling Atta Boy Plumbing again when I need work done or have a problem at my home.

reviews.author: Arthur Murray
reviews.text: Riley did an excellent job flushing our tankless system. He arrived on time and explained the service in detail. He waited after to make sure the water was heated to the proper temperature and everything was clear. Would definitely recommend this company.

reviews.author: Mark French
reviews.text:
Back in November, my daughter had a plumbing issue at her house. She and her husband called another company who came out and told her that she had a blocked drain and she would need to spend $27,000 to rip up the floor and run new drains between the bathroom and the kitchen. She was in a panic. It was C&C Meyers. They would not even put a camera down the line to see where the issue was.
I have used Blitch many times in the past and suggested they give them a call. They came out the next day and put a camera down the pipe identified the problem and recommended a course of action.
They showed up the following Monday morning and in two days had run a new pipe and cut the old one. The total bill was less than 1/5!  They left their area immaculate every day and kept everyone informed. My son-in-law is an engineer and was super impressed. I could not recommend Blitch highly enough. They will always be my first and only call when it comes to plumbing.

reviews.author: Robin Crisp
reviews.text:
I have been with Blitch plumbing for over 40 years. We have had just about every plumbing issue there is over the 40 years.
They always come that day or the day after we call. Their highly skilled technicians are always polite and explain everything and cost up front. My most recent issue, old copper pipes leaking. Their technicians DW and Damien went above and beyond.
I would highly recommend having Blitch plumbing as your only company to call.
Robin Crisp

reviews.author: Warren Redman-Gress
reviews.text: Blitch Plumbing came to my rescue once again! We've used them a few times now, and every single experience has been consistently wonderful. They're always quick to respond and super professional. I called yesterday afternoon about a leak, expecting to wait at least a day or two, but they scheduled me right away for today. They called prior to arriving, then their plumber even apologized for arriving two hours early‚Äîtalk about great service! He fixed the issue quickly, cleaned everything up, and was respectful of my home. The price was fair, but honestly, the level of care and attention was above and beyond. Highly recommend!

reviews.author: Laurie Ward
reviews.text: I'm so grateful for Blitch Plumbing.  I live in an older house, and have had to use their services many times for various repairs.  Lucky me, Ben came to the rescue this morning to fix a running toilet that no amount of "jiggling" could remedy.  He fixed the toilet, made me smile, and my day started on a higher note than I expected.  So thanks to Blitch again for friendly and professional service that's also very timely!

reviews.author: Sharon Godley
reviews.text: I highly recommend Blitch. Within an hour, they installed a brand new toilet and even fixed a broken door! Friendly technician who went far and beyond what was asked. I would definitely use them again.
